channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Danny X straps on a rocket booster in 'Pups Stop A Rocket-Powered Pogo Stick', then in 'Pups Save the Sky-High Stunt Show', Francois' stunt goes horribly awry. (S11, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Chef makes some delicious cat food for Azrael in 'Smurfalicious Catfood', and then in 'Waffle Thief', Dwayne loves Lily's waffles and keeps wanting more. (S4, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Baby Benny Box is Here!: Baby Box is getting a Box Baby brother. Gabby and Pandy go in the dollhouse to meet the new baby, Benny Box. Mama Box asks Gabby, Pandy, and Baby Box to babysit! (S3, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Blaze's First Race: Blaze and his friends remember their first ever race together, back when they were little monster machines with big dreams of becoming racers! (S8, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Liberty comes to visit just in time to save the Turbots in 'Liberty's Mountain Rescue', then in 'Pups Save a Flying Farmer Yumi', the wind takes Farmer Yumi and Garby on a wild flight. (S10, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Danny X straps on a rocket booster in 'Pups Stop A Rocket-Powered Pogo Stick', then in 'Pups Save the Sky-High Stunt Show', Francois' stunt goes horribly awry. (S11, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: In The Future: On a sleepover at the Sheep's house, Peppa and Suzy sit up in bed talking about what they will do when they are grown up. (S5, ep 34).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Kiddie Workout: At playgroup, Madame Gazelle has invited Mr Potato to lead Peppa and her friends in a wonderfully fun musical.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Pizza! Pizza!; The Sandcastle: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Talking; The Marble Run: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Fire Station Practice; Guinea Pigs: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Golf Course: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Picnic: On a tour of the Elf Factory, the Elf and Fairy children learn about recycling and see how rubbish is re-used. When the factory runs out of material, they set out to find some more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Granny and Granpapa: A magical card arrives in the Little Kingdom, inviting everyone to a party at Granny and Granpapa Thistle's castle in the clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Bunty II: Mr Elf has built a new boat to replace the one Big Bad Barry ate. He is nervous when the king commands him to take them on a cruise to a tropical paradise - will Big Bad Barry strike again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Honey Bees: Ben and Holly visit the bee hive to see how honey is made. Wise Old Elf is the bee keeper and he proceeds to show the children his special way of collecting honey.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Yumi's bees go missing from her farm in 'Pups Save the Honey', and in 'Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse', Mayor Goodway's purse disappears along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta! (S6, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons in 'Pups Save a Sweet Mayor', then in 'Pups Save a Magic Trick', the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies. (S8, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Snow Cruise: The Gabby Cats go on a cruise to see Pete the Polar Bear's new rainbow igloo. Along the way, Mercat helps them learn about all kinds of fun things that water does. (S3, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Babysitting; Work and Play: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Whistling; Horsey Twinkle Toes: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: London; George's Wooly Hat: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny and Grandpa's Attic: Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player, along with some very funny old records.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Children's Fete: The school roof has a leak, again! The children organise a fete to raise money for a new roof.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit track a legendary creature in 'The Legend of the Night Howler', then in 'The Haystack Stakeout', who would steal a cute forest pika's dry flower pile? (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Meteorite finds a night club in the forest in 'Disco Smurf', then in 'Dwayne's New Toy', Diaper Daddy is looking for a more loving family after being betrayed by Handy. (S4, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora's family makes a pinata for Mami that flies away in 'A Pinata For Mami', then in 'Invisi-Swiper', Swiper swipes an invisibility blanket. (S2, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelette in 'Pups Save a Hatchling', then in 'Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand', Traveling Travis volunteers to watch the farm. (S9, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Daring Danny X is at it again in 'Pups Bear-ly Save Danny', then in 'Pups Save the Mayor's Tulips', Mayor Humdinger sabotages Mayor Goodway's perfect petals for the tulip contest.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups build a new sport of Bunny Ball in 'The Crew Builds a Mini Golf Course', then in 'The Crew Builds a Butterfly Garden', Motor finds a special blue butterfly. (S2, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Ice Treasure: After discovering an ice road that leads to a giant ice treasure, Blaze, AJ, Watts and Gabby go an adventure to find out what's inside! (S7, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: DJ's Glow Ride: Gabby receives a glow-in-the-dark train, but its cars are missing. With help from DJ Catnip, the Gabby Cats build the remaining cars. (S1, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Bunty II: Mr Elf has built a new boat to replace the one Big Bad Barry ate. He is nervous when the king commands him to take them on a cruise to a tropical paradise - will Big Bad Barry strike again.

channel.desc: Pizza! Pizza!; The Sandcastle: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rubble's cousin visits Adventure Bay in 'Charger Visits the Pups', and then in 'Pups Save a Shiny Ride', Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a contest. (S9, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool! (S7, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works. (S7, ep 22).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick; Racquet Games: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Roof Top Garden; Moving In: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston Goes to the Vet: Ben Elf and his parents are going on holiday in the elf truck but Gaston the Ladybird has swallowed the car keys.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dolly Plum: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.
